short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a new-tab page replacement with personal analytics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
shows your day's activity online

gives you your accumulated web-browsing time, and page-count, and renders them on a nice timeline.

it also closes existing new-tab pages, so you don't have many empty pages open at once.

basically, it just shows you just how badass you are
